extendedInfo.description: Packing List helps you to create and maintain packing lists. It not only lets user to create a list from scratch, but also allows you to generate lists from an existing one. This application comes with a pre-loaded packing master list. You can simply check the categories/ items for their trip, click on âGenerate Listâ menu item and you will have a packing list ready in no time. You can group items by category, location and luggage. Each items also has note, quantity and weight fields. Mass change features allow you to edit lists more easily. You may also email and share your lists. Printing out a copy of the lists helps you in case of lost luggage. Key features include:	â¢ Pre-loaded master list	â¢ Create new list from scratch or generate from existing one	â¢ Support Multiple lists	â¢ Reorder categories/items using drag/drop	â¢ Mass change for easy editing	â¢ Group by location/luggage for easy packing	â¢ All the lists are saved on SD card	â¢ Email/Share lists	â¢ Shortcut to particular list from home screenPlease check the help file for detailed information.Please email us if you have questions or report bugs.5/23/2011 v3.0.1Fix bug in "Add items to existing list"5/14/2011 V3.0.0 Release notes:* Add new home screen displaying lists' name along with their last modified date, the count of the packed items and percentage.* Add more settings to allow user to customize the background/text colors (full version only)* Allow user to edit items in Group by Location/Luggage mode* Add weight field to items. When group by luggage, the total weight will be calculated and displayed next to each luggage. User can choose to use "English Units" or "Metric" system in Settings.* Add more mass changes in full version. Now you can copy and move multiple items between categories or delete them.* Add mass change location/luggage in Group by Location/Luggage mode* Add "Search" functionality* Add sort by packed items* Other minor enhancement and bug fixes7/28/2011 V3.0.2* Fix "Force Close" bugs in starting and other places* Allow adding shortcuts for particular list to home screen* Other improvement and bug fixes9/19/2011 V3.0.3:* Add online packing list editor at www.dotnetideas.com* Fix minor bugs 3/28/2012 V3.0.4:* Fix "Force Close" bug in group by luggage6/19/2012 V3.1.0* Add destination, departure/return date and notes to list and sort lists by departure date* Add "Mass Change" mode which allow user to check items separately for mass change. Doing mass change will not mess checked items for packing anymore* Lite version has full access to "Mass Change" nowFull version only:* Quick quantity editing* Allow user to check weather for destinations * List syncing and sharing (separate purchase of Packing List Cloud Connector is required)

reviews.title: Useful app for recurring checklists
reviews.comment: I like the ability (with the cloud connector add-on) to sync lists with multiple users. The online list editing tool is helpful, although somewhat awkward to use, and the metadata editing features are useful. What I\'d like to see in a future release is either sub-categories or hierarchical listings; for example, a large shipping case might have several smaller cases inside it, each with its own list of contents. That addition would take this app closer to an industrial-level app.
reviews.author: Joseph Bly

reviews.title: Best packing list I\'ve found
reviews.comment: I tried several packing list apps looking for one as useful as the one I had on my Palm, and this is the best. It has locations, suitcases, and trips, and with the Cloud Connector allows syncing between devices.
reviews.author: Gael Chaney

reviews.title: Large list impossible
reviews.comment: The online editor is too clunky or buggy to enter any large lists.
reviews.author: William Speaks

reviews.title: A Great Packing Aid
reviews.comment: Packing List was always good but editing, backing up, sharing was cumbersome. Now that there is a cloud connector, it\'s a complete package.
reviews.author: Andrew Harding

reviews.title: Unintuitive
reviews.comment: I\'m disappointed with this app. You can\'t update an existing list and add items from the master, very cumbersome to even create a list.  I can\'t even find a way to get a refund. I\'ve uninstalled and will not recommend.
reviews.author: Cindy K

reviews.title: Having Trouble
reviews.comment: Everything listen in the  pics on the full version isnt working with my new Galaxy s4.  I csn only do the +&-.  I cant even add multiple lists.  This sucks.
reviews.author: Brandy Ellis

reviews.title: Ok but..
reviews.comment: Using cm10 jelly bean, and can\'t find the menu button anywhere!
reviews.author: adam schroyen

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Would rate 5 stars if the synchronization functionality were working.
reviews.author: Patrizia Elisabeth Schwartz

reviews.title: Cannot save lists with /
reviews.comment: Get error that it can\'t save to SD card if there\'s a / in the list name. Took me a while to figure out why a list wouldn\'t save. There should be a different error message for this problem. Otherwise a good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!! Very Useful!!
reviews.comment: Very nice. List easily customizable. I\'m sure I will get a lot of use out of this app and will have everything I need when leaving for a trip :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Very useful and easy to modify.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: disregard last rating
reviews.comment: it works, you see...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent packing utility
reviews.comment: Best one I\'ve owned b/w both my Android and my Iphone.  Simple to use, but fully functional and customizable. Ability to create lists online and download to phone is a great feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: I love this. It makes it so much easier to get packed quickly. My only complaint is that if you have a category open, and the orientation of the screen changes from horizontal to vertical or vice versa (such as when you pick your phone up, put it down, or open/close your keyboard), the open category closes, which can get annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: How this overrides my previous review. The one minor quibble I had doesn\'t exist - I found the feature I wanted. This is a great app for check listing, and the meta data is really helpful. I used to do this in excel, and this is much easier. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like it
reviews.comment: Really speeds things up when you are in a rush and have a frequent trip. Easy to use and manage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Would love to see lists sync across devices. I also would love to have a database of items larger than just the masterlist. As is, though, awesome app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well - one feature request
reviews.comment: Would love to see it allow me to have the same item in multiple categories at once.  So for example, I could have \"black shoes\" in both the \"formal dress\" category and the \"shoes\" category.  If I checked off the item while viewing it in one category, it would automatically be checked off in the other (since it\'st he same item).  I had this with my old HandyShopper packing lists, and believe me, it\'s a really nice way to handle packing lists.  No worrying about what category things are in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works perfectly and easy to use!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: I\'m so happy with this. I can\'t go anywhere without a packing list. It\'s easy to make a list & keep reusing it for different trips. Works fine on G2.
reviews.author: A Google User
